columns.station_id: The unique identifier for each bike station.
columns.bikes_available: The current number of bikes available at the station.
columns.docks_available: The current number of docking spaces available.
columns.time: The timestamp indicating the record's creation time.

status.table_description: The table tracks bike availability and docking spaces at stations.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each bike station.
columns.name: The name of the bike station.
columns.lat: The latitude coordinate of the bike station.
columns.long: The longitude coordinate of the bike station.
columns.dock_count: The total number of docking spaces at the station.
columns.city: The city where the bike station is located.
columns.installation_date: The date the bike station was installed.

station.table_description: The table provides details about bike stations and their attributes.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each bike trip.
columns.duration: The total time duration of the trip in seconds.
columns.start_date: The date and time when the trip started.
columns.start_station_name: The name of the station where the trip began.
columns.start_station_id: The unique identifier for the start station.
columns.end_date: The date and time when the trip ended.
columns.end_station_name: The name of the station where the trip concluded.
columns.end_station_id: The unique identifier for the end station.
columns.bike_id: The unique identifier for the bike used during the trip.
columns.subscription_type: The type of subscription (Subscriber/Customer) for the trip.
columns.zip_code: The zip code associated with the trip's starting location.

trip.table_description: The table records details of bike trips, including start and end data.

columns.date: The date of the recorded weather data.
columns.max_temperature_f: The highest recorded temperature in Fahrenheit.
columns.mean_temperature_f: The average temperature recorded in Fahrenheit.
columns.min_temperature_f: The lowest recorded temperature in Fahrenheit.
columns.max_dew_point_f: The highest dew point temperature in Fahrenheit.
columns.mean_dew_point_f: The average dew point temperature in Fahrenheit.
columns.min_dew_point_f: The lowest dew point temperature in Fahrenheit.
columns.max_sea_level_pressure_inches: The highest sea level pressure in inches.
columns.mean_sea_level_pressure_inches: The average sea level pressure in inches.
columns.min_sea_level_pressure_inches: The lowest sea level pressure in inches.
columns.max_visibility_miles: The maximum visibility distance in miles.
columns.mean_visibility_miles: The average visibility distance in miles.
columns.min_visibility_miles: The minimum visibility distance in miles.
columns.max_wind_Speed_mph: The highest wind speed recorded in miles per hour.
columns.mean_wind_speed_mph: The average wind speed recorded in miles per hour.
columns.max_gust_speed_mph: The highest gust wind speed in miles per hour.
columns.precipitation_inches: The total precipitation recorded in inches.
columns.cloud_cover: The level of cloud cover on a scale from 0 to 8.
columns.events: The weather events recorded (e.g., Rain, Fog).
columns.wind_dir_degrees: The wind direction measured in degrees.
columns.zip_code: The zip code associated with the weather data.

weather.table_description: The table provides weather data including temperature, humidity, and precipitation.
